mapper.select:
select count(da.id) from donation_apply da join alumni a on(da.alumni_id = a.id) join donation d on(da.donation_id = d.id) where da.is_delete = 0 and a.is_delete and d.is_delete = 0
and a.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and d.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and da.createTime = #{createTime}
